title: W. Scott Guthrie Fund presented by the Executive MBA Alumni
description: To be used at the discretion of the director of the Executive MBA Program to support areas with the greatest need. If $25K is reached within 5 years, the gifts will be endowed as a permanent endowment subject to CUF policies.
marketingContent: To be used at the direction or the director of the EMBA Program to support areas with the greatest need.  If $25,000 is reached within 5 years, the gifts will be invested as a permanent endowment subject to CUF policies.
